summary: A configurable residual block that incorporates skip connections and standard convolution‑norm‑activation‑dropout layers, designed for use in DynUNet/U‑Net style architectures for biomedical image segmentation across arbitrary spatial dimensions.
business_intent: Enable developers to assemble flexible, high‑performance segmentation networks for medical imaging by providing a reusable, parameter‑driven building block that simplifies model construction and improves accuracy.
